reviews.review_title: Vraiment fabuleux , merci pour l’accueil, la gentillesse ! On recommande ☺️
reviews.positive_text:
L’accueil quand on arrive, vraiment super! 
La propreté et une odeur fabuleuse à l’entrée, la décoration de l’hôtel - 
Le petit déjeuner était vraiment délicieux, raffiné, de très bon goût avec de bons produits! 

La chambre était super, pas très grande mais suffisant, très joliment décoré, la qualité du lit était top et la Clim fantastique ! 

La réduction pour le parking est un véritable +++ dans une ville!
Tout sauf le stationnement est impossible devant et pas cool pour décharger les valises .

Classe et design, on s’est senti vraiment bien dans notre chambre!! 
Cet hôtel vaut clairement son prix !
Et déjeuner délicieux et copieux pour bien démarrer la journée ;)
Je recommande!

La chambre était jolie et très bien équipée tout comme la salle de bains.
Les personnes à la réception très agréables.
Il y a la possibilité d'emprunter ou louer des vélos directement à l'hôtel.
reviews.negative_text:
Le bus traverse le carrefour en bas de la chambre.
Il émet toutes les quelques minutes une sonnerie pour avertir les piétons de son arrivée.
Nous étions en hiver donc avec la fenêtre fermée la plupart du temps, mais en été, je pense que cela aurait été assez agaçant.

Il nous a été difficile de bien dormir, sans compter qu’en couple, une soirée du 31-12… bref. Au moindre mouvement, le lit grinçait énormément. Quant à la salle de bain, bien que très propre, et désolé du détail: mais la brosse à wc à une fonction bien spécifique. Constater que celle-ci était salle et pourvue de souvenirs appartenants à de précédents clients… cela a gâché tout ce qui paraissait superbe au départ

reviews.review_title: Great staff and location but rooms too small
reviews.positive_text:

We loved the location. Close to the centre but quiet. 
Breakfast was great and good value for 16 Euros each.
Nice contemporary design.
reviews.negative_text:
We knew the rooms were small when we booked but we felt they were too small. We had to take it in turns to move about the room.
Closet space was minimal so fine for a couple of nights but inadequate for any longer.
The weather was unexpectedly cold when we visited but the temperature of the hotel is adjusted centrally for the whole hotel, so they were unable to change it. They tried to put the heated towel rail on but sadly it didn’t work.
The towels were thin and felt well used!

reviews.review_title: Great hotel with very bad room design
reviews.positive_text: Wonderful staff & warm welcome,  great location, lovely place to stay in general.
reviews.negative_text: Room facilities were very poor, Perhaps it was because we were in an attic room, but there was almost no hanging space (not even enough for two coats) and there was not even a single chair to sit on, or any desk to sit up to - it was the bed or nothing. Website very clearly states there is a Bang & Olufsen sound system in every room but it simply did not exist. (Though Chromecast through TV was available and did work)  The bed-side tables were tiny and yet one was entirely taken up by a beautiful but totally-unnecesary-in-2024 landline phone, so good luck putting down a book or a tablet. Very weird design choices for somewhere so recently refurbished, and they spoilt an otherwise excellent hotel.

reviews.review_title: We really enjoyed our stay at the Hébé
reviews.positive_text: This hotel has a convenient location near the train station and we enjoyed having a room with a balcony. The bed was comfy, everything was clean, breakfast was great, and the staff was friendly and helpful. The entrance and dining areas are nice as is the little terrace out back. You can rent bikes from the hotel, but, unfortunately, we didn't have time. From the hotel, you can get to the old town and lake very easily, and the day of our departure, the hotel kept our luggage while we took one more little walk.
reviews.negative_text: Parking for the adjacent building is just to the left of the entrance to the Hébé so be careful! The street is a bit noisy, so we were happy to have ear plugs and noise-cancelling headphones.

reviews.review_title: Nice, small hotel in Anncey. Clean, comfortable, with wonderful staff.
reviews.positive_text: Location is good that it is not in the heart of the tourist area, but is close to the train station, which can be both good and bad as there are people hanging around. Parking for the hotel is in a local parking garage which is near the hotel, but had many people hanging out in the parking area. Did not feel safe in that regard. Rooms are small, so book accordingly.  We loved that electric bikes were available at the hotel and easy to use.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance. Great scenery in walking distance. Great biking around Lake Anncey.
reviews.negative_text: Parking to get luggage into and out of the hotel is very difficult. The parking garage as mentioned is close by in discounted on price but is also somewhat questionable.

Stayed for one night en-route to our skiing holiday in the French Alps. What a fabulous hotel this is. We normally stay in Beaune but decided to try Annecy instead and so pleased we did. Incredibly helpful owners/staff, went above and beyond to make our stay perfect. The decor is super, fabulous attention to detail and very high quality. Great location to the beautiful old town 
approx 5-10min walk and 15-20 min walk to the scenic lake. Great location all round, underground parking very nearby, also close to public transport if required. Breakfast is a must, delicious & great quality ingredients too. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will be booking a return stay next year. Thank you so much

מלון בוטיק מעוצב ויפהפה. מיקום מעולה ממש סמוך לעיר העתיקה וקרוב לאגם. חדרים מקסימים מעט קטנים אבל מאוד נוחים ויפים. שירות מעולה ונעים ובמיוחד נציין את  Hugo מהקבלה שהיה מאוד נחמד ונתן לנו המלצות טובות למסעדות. חוויה מומלצת לשכור מהמלון אופניים חשמלים ולעשות טיול סביב האגם. מלון מקסים שחזרנו אליו שוב ללילה נוסף בסיום הטיול לפני הטיסה מג'נבה.

reviews.review_title: Rundum angenehmer Aufenthalt in ansprechendem Ambiente
reviews.positive_text:
Die Unterkunft ist zentral, trotzdem ruhig beim Bahnhof  gelegen. Alles ist modern, diskret und ansprechend gestaltet. 
Zudem sind die Betten bequem und der Fernseher grosszügig. Alles war sehr sauber und komfortabel.
Der Frühstücksraum ist freundlich und angenehm, das Frühstück selber frisch und gut portioniert, 
Das Personal durchwegs freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Wir würden wieder dieses Hotel auswählen.

Saubere, ruhige Zimmer und sehr nette Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter. Das Hotel liegt nur wenige Fußschritte von der Altstadt entfern. Die Parkmöglichkeiten sind gut.
reviews.negative_text: Wir waren sehr zufrieden!

reviews.review_title: ottima soluzione per vedere il centro di annecy
reviews.positive_text: posizione molto buona struttura nuovissima camere appena ristrutturate ma con lavabo in camera, vaso in un bunker e doccia pure in camera..... 3 metri quadri in più per un bagno autonomo non sarebbero stati disprezzati
reviews.negative_text: direi solo il tema del bagno "a pezzi"

reviews.positive_text:
Hotel nuevo y muy limpio, personal muy amable, ubicación inmejorable y lo mejor de todo, el  estacionamiento!!!!  (La Post ) a un paso,  el hotel pagó las dos noches que pasamos ahí. Súper!!! 👍
Muchas gracias!!!
reviews.negative_text: Todo muy bien!!! Nada que reclamar

reviews.positive_text: Personal muy agradable, habitaciones modernas bien equipadas, opción de desayuno con carta y alquiler de bicicletas eléctricas dentro del mismo establecimiento. El hotel es muy céntrico.
Sehr gute Lage!
jättetrevlig personal

Stanza pulita, moderna e con arredamento moderno.  
Bella struttura in posizione centrale e comodissima.
Ottima colazione.

reviews.review_title: Annecy hat sehr viel Charme. Gerne wieder und gerne wieder in diesem Hotel.
reviews.positive_text: Äusserst zentral und trotzdem ruhig gelegen. Unser Zimmer lag im 3. Stock nach hinten raus. 3 min zu Fuss vom Bahnhof und 5 min in die Altstadt. Das Personal war immer sehr freundlich. Das öffentliche Parkhaus „la Poste“ ebenfalls 2 min entfernt und preiswert. Für 3 Tage und Nächte weniger als 30€.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe Double ou Lits Jumeaux

reviews.positive_text: فندق نظيف جدا وقريب من مواقف لا بوست ويعطونك كرت الصبح عشان ما تدفع كثير للباركنق

reviews.review_title: 地理位置非常好，临近火车站、大巴站、闹中取静，到景区也很近，非常方便。酒店小而精，很干净，服务人员态度和善非常友好，入住体验很好，个人感觉带沙发的房间比有阳台的实用一些。
reviews.positive_text: 早餐很不错，味道不错也很充足

كل شيء من نظافة و موقع و حسن تعامل من الموظفين 
الموظفة ( آنا ) كانت متعاونة معنا جدا و لطيفة
reviews.negative_text:
لا يوجد مواقف 
المواقف العامة قريبة و لكن ضيقة

reviews.positive_text: Die Lage
reviews.negative_text: Das Zimmer ist def. zu klein - nicht einmal ein Stuhl, es roch nach Kanalisation. Das Fenster war mühsam zum schliessen. Kein Wasserdruck für Haare zu spühlen unmöglich , Ja das Frühstück ist  schlecht für 15 Euro pro Person unglaublich mussten den Butter suchen,...  Brot war nicht frisch ...Preis zur Leistung eine absolute Frechheit! Wir können dieses Hotel nicht weiterempfehlen... Wir mussten lange einen Parkplatz suchen unglaublich ....

reviews.review_title: nooit meer! 4 sterren : Van waar komen die?
reviews.positive_text: geen ontbijt genomen. we hadden al genoeg betaald.
reviews.negative_text:
Als je 210€ betaald zonder ontbijt mag je iets meer comfort  verwachten.
Lavabo in de kamer en wel een goede douche maar geen badkamer!!!

reviews.review_title: מלון מקסים באזור טוב . מרכזי. שרות ויחס מעולים.
reviews.positive_text:
מיקום מעולה . קרוב לעיר העתיקה . מסעדות בתי קפה באזור. חניון במלון .כאשר הוא מלא יש חניון מומלץ על ידי המלון ובהנחה   5-10 דקות הליכה מהמלון. לנו היה מאד נח.
המלון מעוצב מקסים נקי מאד ושקט מאד.
יחס ושירות מצוינים.
reviews.negative_text: החדרים קטנים וצפופים .
